definition: (of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
spout/spray/belch/to well up/to puff out/to spurt out

sentences.english: and the mother was very, very disturbed.
sentences.chinese: 拿着水枪玩耍，喷得到处都是水，让妈妈非常生气。

sentences.english: Comparison of two major In-Cylinder Direct-Injection Gasoline Engines is given.
sentences.chinese: 对目前两种主要的缸内在喷方案进行了分析对比。

sentences.english: I could not hold my calmness any more and shouted at him irritatingly.
sentences.chinese: 我再也无法平静，眼睛喷了火，逼视着他。

sentences.english: The vehicle, painted white with a red crescent, was parked at the clinic entrance, where Osama was busily cleaning it.
sentences.chinese: 车漆成白色，喷上红新月标识，停在医院门口。

sentences.english: Although their juices had run dry, the leaves still exuded a pleasant aroma.
sentences.chinese: 只管已干涸，落叶仍披发出好闻的喷香味。

sentences.english: “Get you some wasp spray, ” she says. “It’ll put their eyes out.”
sentences.chinese: “你去搞罐杀虫喷雾剂，”她说，“喷瞎他们。”

sentences.english: Too bad, you best talent is squirting milk from your nose.
sentences.chinese: 我看大家最好的才艺展示就是从鼻子里喷牛奶了。

sentences.english: A type of recovery booth that incorporates a cartridge filter system to collect overspray powder.
sentences.chinese: 一个过滤收集过喷粉末的一体化装置。

sentences.english: The banana bears two crops every year.
To directly spray the stain with a few minutes, then rinse.
sentences.chinese: 将本品直接喷在污垢处，数分钟后，再用清水冲洗。

sentences.english: Spray Impulse all over your body for an exhilarating blend of fruits and florals that will make you go 'BLING BLING'.
sentences.chinese: 将这款令人愉快的混有果味和花香的喷雾喷在全身。

sentences.english: Did you spray them with the hose?
sentences.chinese: 你用水龙带喷他们水了吗？

sentences.english: The hot vapour spouted from a rusted pipe.
sentences.chinese: 热蒸汽从一个生了锈的管子里喷了出来。

sentences.english: The perfume consumer presumably assumes that the volume is resumed.
sentences.chinese: 喷鼻水消费者假定地设想音量已恢复。

sentences.english: Please note that the dress has no glitter spayed on it .
sentences.chinese: 请注意那件服装上是没有喷上闪光的。

sentences.english: Do not spray aerosol or pump products in enclosed areas.
sentences.chinese: 不喷气雾剂或泵产品，在密封领域。

definition: to talk crap/to be full of shit
(Internet slang) to attack verbally/to publicly criticize/to call out
to flip out/to act out violently
to swear or curse (at people)/to scold or yell at someone
to clean the floor/(Internet slang) (lit.) to wash (the blood) off the floor/(fig.) to cover up evidence of sb's wrongdoing/to defend (a wrongdoer)/(coll.) to carpet-bomb
